showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ !  Bargains galore right here!  Certain clothing like Extra-Long Length Cotton  T's are on sale right now.  Truckers can easily get a shower.  Some Trucker Supplies are available & their Gift selection is cute.  There's a Tire & Repair Shop ‚Ä¶
Stopped here last night to park for the night, place has a Chester's Chicken and Subway, Showers and Bathrooms... Typical Love's for all intensive purposes. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and offered to give us a ride.  It was so sweet of her!!!  after we came to Love's to take a shower and met her there again.  All the employees of this place are very friendly, smiling and lovely!  We will definitely come here again when we ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ it asking me weird questions and assuming, then got mad because the white girl gave me one. I don't steal towels and I clean my mess when I'm done showering.  I wanted to have words after I was done to ask why I was treated that way after ‚Ä¶

Probably one of the worst truck stops I've ever been to. First, went to get my shower. Punched my code in the door, opened door, and some one was already in it. Shocked he was. Second I get a new shower. Walk in and dirty towels were on the ‚Ä¶
Nice clean restrooms and friendly staff. If you need a shower they have those as well. You can use your Love's travel card for extra points to use later on

Took forever to get a shower, but what really bad is that their mechanical service for the roof takes even longer.  Been sitting to get service for 3 hours. Finally they took us in the bay. Then it took another 2 hours to start the work.  T ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ service is all about! While waiting for a shower this morning she took the initiative to go and check the shower area to see if any were available after she noticed me standing there for a few minutes. Once she finished attending her ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ posting a much better rating, but your one employee, by the name of Crystal, was very rude. I requested a handicap shower for my wife. Said employee's response was conveyed with a smirk, as she said: "It's in use right now." I ‚Ä¶
This place is nice and clean. And they sell just about everything. The staff is friendly and helpful. And you can even take a shower there. Too cool.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ The showers are absolutely no better. There were trash from a previous customer in the bin, the toilet was clearly not cleaned, the floors were not mopped, the shower handles were not wiped. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ running it into the ground.  Very sad. The shower system is down, the whole system, they won't even manually open the doors and let you use them. I guess it's best to call before wasting your time parking here. I think the showers are down ‚Ä¶

Brand new truckstop, but the showers are completely unacceptable with how dirty they are. The showers look like the truckstop is 20 years old. Completely completely unacceptable. Will never shower here again. Instead of cleaning the showers ‚Ä¶

The two lady‚Äôs behind the counter are rude & obnoxious towards the drivers. What a mission just to get a clean shower. When asked for another employee so I didn‚Äôt have to deal with Ms. Attitude I got an another employee with a worse ‚Ä¶

New shop.. beautiful location open space but they have only 4 showers wait  1hours for shower. Service shop is beautiful and easy to in/out..sad part is they have more space for parking is reserved. And burger king worst price .. clueless ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . Everyone here from the shop to the store was so wonderful! Management even comped us a shower when they realized we'd been here for most of a week. The grounds are well kept up and every corner of the store was kept very clean. There ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ So in other words what I am saying if you have a nice staff of people clean restrooms clean shower clean everything don't complain about the shortages of staff when you know that this is something that is going on all over.

They charge 20 to park and 15 to 18 for a shower and my hubbys shower sucked no mirror at all so couldn't shave. I asked to switch when he saw no mirror in there they said none available. To much money to not keep in good repair these basic ‚Ä¶
How do you have 150 parking spots and more but yet only have 3 showers available? Waited two hours for a shower. Close this place down
Dirty shower, dirty laundry‚Ä¶ it's surprising that it's a relatively new place. Good and friendly people.

After purchasing fuel got a shower the shower was not at all clean and older lady told us she‚Äôd really appreciate a tip. Here‚Äôs your tip lady your entitlement does not entitle you to a tip. A properly clean bathroom may get you one though, ‚Ä¶
